TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class MenuAdapter Inherits WebControlAdapter Implements IPostBackEventHandler
type MenuAdapter = class inherit WebControlAdapter interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 提供用于修改特定浏览器的 控件行为的方法。

span.span: Provides the means to modify the behavior of the control for specific browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个修改的标记或行为特定浏览器或浏览器或行为的类作为筛选器控件针对某些功能。A modifies the markup or behavior of a control for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability. 默认情况下中的对象控件呈现为超链接以适应菜单导航。By default, the objects in the control are rendered as hyperlinks to accommodate menu navigation. 类维护状态，通过实现接口，以便它可以响应并在回发过程中引发特定事件。The class maintains state by implementing the interface so that it can respond to and raise specific events during postback. 您可以扩展类，以进一步自定义绘制或行为控件。You can extend the class to further customize rendering or behavior of the control. 适配器在最初请求会导致.NET Framework 映射的适配器进行控制，搜索给定请求的浏览器的特征。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 类使用浏览器定义文件，用于识别客户端浏览器的特征，并将映射到浏览器类型的适配器。The class uses browser definition files to identify the characteristics of the client browser and to map the adapter to the browser type. 有关在 ASP.NET 中的自适应呈现的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述自适应控件行为的](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff(v=vs.100))。For more information about adaptive rendering in ASP.NET, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff(v=vs.100)).

related.span: 自适应控件行为的体系结构概述

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

MemberSignature.Value: public MenuAdapter ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: MenuAdapter();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适配器在最初请求会导致.NET Framework 映射的适配器进行控制，搜索给定请求的浏览器的特征。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 找到相应的适配器后，该控件保存到中的映射的适配器实例的引用其属性。After the adapter is found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property.

summary.span: 检索对与此 对象关联的 控件的强类型引用。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly typed reference to the control associated with this object.

value.span: 与当前 对象关联的 控件。

span.span: The control associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够引用适配器的相应控件。The property provides a way to reference the adapter's corresponding control. 一个适配器关联与特定控件时，.NET Framework 将调用适配器来代替或除了该控件的生命周期方法的生命周期方法。When an adapter is associated with a particular control, the .NET Framework will call the life-cycle methods of the adapter in place of or in addition to the life-cycle methods of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来检索父类的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the control of the parent class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter/CS/contosomenuadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter/VB/contosomenuadapter.vb#2)]

protected public: override void LoadAdapterControlState(System::Object ^ state);
override this.LoadAdapterControlState : obj -> unit

param.name: state
param.span: 包含适配器状态信息的字典形式的 。

span.span: An in the form of a dictionary that contains the adapter's state information.

summary.span: 加载 方法在对页面的前一个请求期间保存的任何控件状态信息。

span.span: Loads any control state information that was saved by the method during a previous request to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当适配器需要维护专用的状态信息时，它会重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the and methods. 情况下类，其中显示的菜单层次结构是依赖于以前所选对象，`state`提供的包含路径的菜单的层次结构中的选定项的名称/值对的字典。In the case of the class, where the displayed menu hierarchy is dependent on the previously selected object, `state` provides a dictionary of name/value pairs containing the path of the selected item in the menu's hierarchy. `state`参数是对象由保存在上一个页请求。The `state` parameter is a object saved by the during a previous request to the page. 如果控件未注册参与控件状态，则适配器必须注册的控件状态。If the control is not registered to participate in control state, the adapter must register for control state. 除了该控件，与其他生命周期方法不同的状态保持适配器控件状态。Adapter control state is maintained in addition to the state for the control, unlike other life-cycle methods.

related.span: 控件状态 vs。视图状态的示例

span.span: Control State vs. View State Sample

param.name: e
param.span: 与此事件关联的 数据。

span.span: The data associated with this event.

summary.span: 将关联的 控件注册为一个要求控件状态的控件。

span.span: Registers the associated control as one that requires control state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关联的控件注册为要求控件状态。The method registers the associated control as one that requires control state. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 调用 Web 服务器控件的自己方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls the Web server control's own method. 但是之后,服务器控件的属性设置，则.NET 框架将调用该适配器实现方法而不是控件的实现。However, after the property of the server control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the method instead of the control's implementation. 使用方法以初始化该控件中的设置。Use the method to initialize settings in the control. 在回发时，这是用于管理与现有的视图状态数据进行交互的重要阶段。During a postback, this is an important phase for managing interaction with existing view-state data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述自适应控件行为的](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 如果适配器重写方法，它必须在基础类上调用相应方法。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.

para.span: 否则为控件自身的不会引发事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the control's own event will not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnPreRender : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 与此事件关联的 数据。

span.span: The data associated with this event.

summary.span: 处理关联的 控件的 方法。

span.span: Handles the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用的内部`OnPreRender`中的方法类。The method calls an internal `OnPreRender` method in the class. 父类，如数据绑定、 应用样式和事件分配所有其他预呈现功能按预期方式执行。All other pre-rendering functions of the parent classes, such as data binding, applying styles, and event assignments perform as expected. 默认情况下，调用.NET Framework控件的方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls the control's method. 但是之后,设置该控件的属性时，.NET 框架将调用该适配器实现方法而不是控件的实现。However, after the property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the method instead of the control's implementation. 使用方法以完成该控件中的任何设置。Use the method to finalize any settings in the control. 若要在此阶段中控制属性所做的更改将保存到视图状态，但在进行更改方法不会保存。Changes made to control properties in this phase will be saved to view state, but changes made in the method are not saved. 有关详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述自适应控件行为的](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 如果适配器重写方法，它必须在基础类上调用相应方法。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.

para.span: 否则为控件自身的方法将不会引发。

span.span: Otherwise, the control's own method will not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RaisePostBackEvent (string eventArgument);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String)
protected: virtual void RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument);
abstract member RaisePostBackEvent : string -> unit override this.RaisePostBackEvent : string -> unit

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: 一个 ，表示菜单层次结构中当前节点的路径。

span.span: A that represents the path of the current node in the menu hierarchy.

summary.span: 用于在引发回发事件时维护菜单的路径。

span.span: Used to maintain the path of the menu when a postback event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时调用方法事件引发时，并用于维护菜单的导航路径。The method is called when the event is raised, and is used to maintain the navigation path of the menu. `eventArgument`参数包含标识当前菜单层次结构中的位置的菜单项的分隔的字符串。The `eventArgument` parameter contains a delimited string of menu items that identify the current location in the menu hierarchy. 页的值传递`eventArgument`到关联控件的方法。The page passes the value of `eventArgument` to the associated control's method. 关联控件还会呈现导致回发发生的标记元素。The associated control also renders the markup element that causes the postback to occur. 如果该控件将呈现回发的客户端脚本，传递从脚本参数`eventArgument`参数。If the control renders client-side script for postback, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter. 如果回发由简单 submit`eventArgument`是`null`。If the postback is caused by a simple submit, `eventArgument` is `null`.

exception.span: 当前节点的深度超出了允许范围。

span.span: The depth of the current node is more than allowed.

exception.span: 无效声明、上次请求后进行了更改或伪造（欺诈）的请求都可能导致这种状况。

span.span: This can be caused by an invalid declaration, by a change since the last request, or by a forged (spoofed) request.

param.name: writer
param.span: 实例，包含用于生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法。

span.span: The instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 添加标记特性，并将表示控件开始标记的标志写入到将被发送至浏览器或设备的输出流中。

span.span: Adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法将添加标记属性和控件的开始标记的标记写入输出流发送到客户端浏览器的响应流。The method adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser. 对象将呈现中单独方法和控件将关闭到后续调用方法。The objects will be rendered individually in the method and the control will be closed with a call to the subsequent method. 重写当你想要实现自定义行为。Override when you want to implement custom behavior. 例如，重写的方法，如将多个标记写入响应流内容，任何控件之前`
`。For example, override the method to write multiple tags to the response stream before any control content, such as `
`. 使用方法结合方法，可确保开始和结束标记在输出中的一致性。Use the method in conjunction with the method to assure opening and closing tag consistency in your output.

summary.span: 将关联的 控件中关联的菜单项作为一系列超链接写入到输出流。

span.span: Writes the associated menu items in the associated control to the output stream as a series of hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法写入对象关联的到输出流为超链接控件。The method writes the objects of the associated control to the output stream as hyperlinks. 方法从调用方法，用于执行呈现到的设备浏览器的标记代码的修改。The method is called from the method and is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser. 在此阶段中的生命周期，以及仅实际标记创建控件此处这样做之前，应设置控件属性。Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle, and only the actual markup creation for the control done here. 不保存在生命周期的此阶段对控件所做的更改视图状态。Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state. 用于保存对控件所做的更改，重写事件。For saving changes made to the control, override the event.

exception.span: 当前项的深度超出了允许范围。

span.span: The depth of the current item is more than allowed.
-or-
The current item is disabled.

summary.span: 创建最终的标记，并将控件的结束标记 (tag) 的标记 (markup) 写入发出至浏览器或设备的输出流。

span.span: Creates final markup and writes the markup for the closing tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将该控件的结束标记的标记写入到输出流发送到客户端浏览器的响应流。The method writes the markup for the closing tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser. 在呈现的特性，样式特性和开始标记方法。The attributes, style attributes, and opening tag are rendered in the method. 对象呈现中单独方法。The objects are rendered individually in the method. 重写当你想要实现自定义行为。Override when you want to implement custom behavior. 例如，重写的方法，多个结束标记写入响应流之后写入任何控件内容，如``。For example, override the method to write multiple closing tags to the response stream after any control content, such as ``. 使用方法结合方法，可确保开始和结束标记在输出中的一致性。Use the method in conjunction with the method to assure opening and closing tag consistency in your output.

span.span: The position of the specified object in the menu hierarchy.

summary.span: 将一个菜单项以超链接的形式呈现。

span.span: Renders a single menu item as a hyperlink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从中调用方法方法来检索的样式和间距属性从对象，并将它们应用于新创建的超链接元素。The method is called from the method to retrieve the styles and spacing attributes from the object and apply them to a newly created hyperlink element. 菜单层次结构会遍历方法，并将调用方法以呈现每个项。The menu hierarchy is traversed in the method and will call the method to render each item. 每个项呈现为超链接和继承的属性和指定的样式控件。Each item is rendered as a hyperlink and inherits the properties and styles of the specified control. 将呈现给页的超链接是以下值之一：The hyperlink rendered to the page is one of the following: - 若要打开或选择的项的回发事件。A postback event to open or select the item. - 若要导航到中指定的目标的链接属性的控件。A link to navigate to the target specified in the property of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override object SaveAdapterControlState ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveAdapterControlState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function SaveAdapterControlState () As Object
protected public: override System::Object ^ SaveAdapterControlState();
override this.SaveAdapterControlState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存自页面回发到服务器以来对适配器私有控件状态所做的任何更改。

span.span: Saves any changes to the adapter private control state that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器的控件状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用控件状态来维护当前菜单的导航路径。The method uses the control state to maintain the current navigation path of the menu. 当适配器需要维护专用的状态信息时，它会重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the and methods. 需要在请求中，独立于关联的控件的状态之间维护状态的复杂功能时，适配器可能维护私有控件状态。An adapter might maintain private control state when there are complex features that need to maintain state across requests, separate from the associated control's state. 适配器需要注册期间的控件状态中的每个请求的方法调用。The adapter needs to register for control state during the method call in every request.

summary.span: 赋予 类处理将页面回发到服务器时引发的事件的能力。

span.span: Enables the class to process an event raised when a page is posted back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使类来处理页面回发到服务器时引发的事件。The method enables the class to process an event that is raised when a page is posted back to the server. 将页传递`eventArgument`到方法。The page passes `eventArgument` to the method.
